item.description:
This group is for hikers who haven't given up on their love of hiking and being in nature despite their age or level of physical conditioning. We hike at a pace 50% slower than the AMC Trailguide book time. There are three other hiking Meetup groups if you want a faster pace or more challenging hikes (The New England Hiking Meetup, 4 Seasons Hiking Group, New England Over 40 Hiking Group). Our goal is to stay fit while enjoying the camaraderie of hikers who have similar skills and goals. This is a dog free hiking group.

 

Trailhead: Take I93 North to Exit 28, make a right onto NH49 East, travel about 5 miles and make a left onto Upper Mad River Road, make a right onto Orris Road. We will hike the trail counter clockwise over the summits of Welch (2,605') and Dickey (2,734'). 50% of the hike will have views, a rarity in the wooded Northeast. 4.4 miles round trip, 1,800' elevation gain, AMC book time 3 hours, 5.5 hours estimated time for our group. ----Steve---- Disclaimer: As a condition of your voluntary participation in this activity you acknowledge and agree to the following: this activity involves inherent risks that can cause property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death to participants and/or others; you assume all risk associated with this activity; you are responsible for having the necessary knowledge, skills, abilities, clothing, and equipment to safely participate in this activity; you know and will follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com; the leader(s) of this activity are volunteers; and you release, hold harmless, and indemnify the leader(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death - including those caused by negligence and/or other reasons.
item.how_to_find_us: Grey Chevy pick up truck NH2646423
item.name: MODERATE HIKE - WELCH AND DICKEY
